general.gigTitle: develop a profitable elearning or online course website

sellerCard.oneLiner: I believe in Quality over Quantity and Speedy Service
sellerCard.description: I am a dedicated WordPress developer nearly 7 years of experience, with 2 of those memberships and E-Learning/LMS Website Development. I have also experience in designing, CSS3, Html5, PHP, javascript and Bootstrap. I can design professional websites of all kind. Send me a message for the quote, I will always do it for you at a reasonable cost.

description.content:
PREMIUM ELEARNING SOLUTION!

Please send me a message - before ordering - so that I can provide you with an accurate quote and delivery deadline!


I believe in quality over quantity & rushy work. It won't be cheap, but it will be a fantastic job. Count me on it


I can design a Learning Management System (LMS) for individuals, startups, companies, training organizations, and entrepreneurs for creating and selling online courses.


Here, what am I offering?


  • Fully Responsive LMS website Desing (mobile, tablet, and desktop)
  • WooCommrece integration
  • Course creation (Lessons, Topics, Quizez)
  • Dashboard for students
  • Drip-feed your lesson content according to a schedule 
  • Popular Payment Gateway Integration
  • Selling PDF & VIDEO Courses via Subscription or Membership
  • BuddyBoss website / online community platform
  • Membership platform with LearnDash and/or BuddyBoss


I am proficient in WordPress, CSS, BuddyBoss, LearnDash, Memberpress, Wpfusion, ActiveCampaign, Elementor and Woocommerce etc.


I am excited to collaborate with you on your project! Let's discuss your requirements and get started.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What i need to get start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: 1).Wordpress LMS/LearnDash login information.  2).Hosting/Cpanel login information(may need later)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Which Premium Themes Do You Prefer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: 1). BuddyBoss  Theme 2). Divi Theme  3). Astra pro theme 4). Kadence theme

packageList.description: I will design a LMS website up to 4 pages.

packageList.description: I will design a LMS website up to 7 pages.

milestones.title: Planning
milestones.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Specifications
steps.description: I'll write the specifications for your site's functionality and features.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Design Concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

steps.title: Final Design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: Content & Delivery
milestones.description: I'll complete the website for delivery.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: The best person I could ever find for my website

Ali did a great job! The site was put together better than I thought. Make sure you have patience for response time because of time zone. He also explains how to navigate through the site so I can make changes on my own.

He helped me on everything, is a good guy!

Thanks for everything

consultationData.description: I'll consult you on building the LMS, the membership system, and the marketing automation of your website. Also, let me let you know the proper pathway  for marketing automation.
